titles.title: For the relief of Alejandra Arias Garcia.
For the relief of Alejandra Arias Garcia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Prohibits Alejandra Arias Garcia from being removed from the United States, denied admission to the United States, or considered ineligible for lawful permanent residence by reason of any ground for removal or denial of admission that is reflected in the records of specified agencies.
